title: Soak the Rice
description: Wash the basmati or Jeerakasala rice thoroughly and soak it in water for 30 minutes.

title: Cook the Rice
description: Boil water in a large pot, add salt and whole spices (cardamom, cloves, cinnamon, bay leaf). Add soaked rice and cook until it is 90% done. Drain the rice and set it aside.

title: Dum Cook the Biryani
description: Place the pot on low heat or on a preheated griddle (tava) and cook for 20-25 minutes. This slow steaming helps flavors meld beautifully.
